alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 23 at 5:33PM MDT until June 23 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GOSHEN AND SOUTHEASTERN PLATTE COUNTIES... At 532 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located 10 miles west of Veteran, or 22 miles southeast of Wheatland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Public confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Slater. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
